content: Electoral district in Ang Mo Kio, SingaporeThis article includes a list of references, related reading, or external links, **but its sources remain unclear because it lacks inline citations**. Please help improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Cheng San Constituency** was a [single member constituency](/wiki/Single_member_constituency) in [Ang Mo Kio](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio), Singapore. The constituency was formed by carving from [Serangoon Gardens SMC](/wiki/Serangoon_Gardens_Single_Member_Constituency) in 1980. In 1988, it was absorbed into [Cheng San Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Cheng_San_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty1980[Lee Yock Suan](/wiki/Lee_Yock_Suan)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)1984 ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee Yock Suan](/wiki/Lee_Yock_Suan)12,31275.89[WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Chong Chee Kwong3,52724.11[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)16,67497.8[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat)[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee Yock Suan](/wiki/Lee_Yock_Suan)[Walkover](/wiki/Walkover)[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)17,328[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics)) - [Cheng San GRC](/wiki/Cheng_San_GRC) - 1984 GE's result - 1980 GE's result This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Cheng San Constituency
